content: hello today topic is my new project for winter crochet toddler girls poncho/capshawl pattern we have done and completed new design for fall and winter season beautiufl poncho free pattern with tutorial i hope you will love and apperciate my new design for childrens and toddlers explain in details in the pattern below showing with the same in my video tutorial you can change sizes make it with different colors according to your choice larger or smaller sizes for kids and girls also can chage for adult ladies and womans we explain below in my pattern for all sizes as you want make we mention about for all sizes in my video tutorial to give you most easier to understand the pattern video tuorial poncho/capshawl with fringe
